data.title: Capital of the Dominican Republic - Santo Domingo.
data.meta_description: It is an immersion into the history and culture of the oldest city on the American continent. It rightfully earned the title of "Cultural Capital of America" in 2010.
data.text:
What does a trip to Santo Domingo entail? It is an immersion into the history and culture of the oldest city on the American continent. It rightfully earned the title of "Cultural Capital of America" in 2010.

Travel time from Bavaro/Punta Cana ~ 2 hours

Toll road cost - 320 pesos

Recommended visiting time - weekdays, as most attractions are closed on weekends
